templates.name: python-start
templates.label: Start with Python
templates.description: A simple Python example of core Actor and Apify SDK features. It reads and validates user input with schema, computes a result and saves it to storage.

messages.postCreate: To install additional Python packages, you need to activate the virtual environment in the ".venv" folder in the actor directory.

templates.name: python-beautifulsoup
templates.label: BeautifulSoup & Requests
templates.description: Example of a web scraper that uses Python Requests to scrape HTML from URLs provided on input, parses it using BeautifulSoup and saves results to storage.

messages.postCreate: To install additional Python packages, you need to activate the virtual environment in the ".venv" folder in the actor directory.

templates.name: python-playwright
templates.label: Playwright & Chrome
templates.description: Crawler example that uses headless Chrome driven by Playwright to scrape a website. Headless browsers render JavaScript and can help when getting blocked.

messages.postCreate:
To run this actor, you need to have Playwright's browsers installed.
To do so, activate the virtual environment in the ".venv" folder in the actor directory, and run "playwright install --with-deps".
To install additional Python packages, you need also need to activate the virtual environment in the ".venv" folder in the actor directory.

templates.name: python-selenium
templates.label: Selenium & Chrome
templates.description: Scraper example built with Selenium and headless Chrome browser to scrape a website and save the results to storage. A popular alternative to Playwright.

messages.postCreate:
To run this actor, you need to have the Selenium ChromeDriver installed.
To install additional Python packages, you need to activate the virtual environment in the ".venv" folder in the actor directory.

templates.name: python-scrapy
templates.label: Scrapy
templates.description: This example Scrapy spider scrapes quotes filtered by input parameters. It shows how to use Apify SDK for Python and Scrapy pipelines to save results.

messages.postCreate: To install additional Python packages, you need to activate the virtual environment in the ".venv" folder in the actor directory.

templates.name: getting_started_node
templates.label: Start with JavaScript
templates.description: A simple JavaScript example of core Actor and Apify SDK features. It reads and validates user input with schema, computes a result and saves it to storage.

templates.name: ts_scrape_single_page
templates.label: Scrape single page in TypeScript
templates.description: Scrape single page with provided URL with Axios and extract data from page's HTML with Cheerio.

templates.name: project_cheerio_crawler_js
templates.label: Crawlee & Cheerio
templates.description: A scraper example that uses HTTP requests and Cheerio to parse HTML. It's fast, but it can't run the website's JavaScript or pass JS anti-scraping challenges.

templates.name: project_puppeteer_crawler_js
templates.label: Crawlee & Puppeteer & Chrome
templates.description: Example of a Puppeteer and headless Chrome web scraper. Headless browsers render JavaScript and are harder to block, but they're slower than plain HTTP.

templates.name: project_playwright_crawler_js
templates.label: Crawlee & Playwright & Chrome
templates.description: Web scraper example with Crawlee, Playwright and headless Chrome. Playwright is more modern, user-friendly and harder to block than Puppeteer.

templates.name: js-bootstrap-cheerio-crawler
templates.label: Bootstrap CheerioCrawler
templates.description: Skeleton project that helps you quickly bootstrap `CheerioCrawler` in JavaScript. It's best for developers who already know Apify SDK and Crawlee.

templates.name: project_cheerio_crawler_ts
templates.label: Crawlee & Cheerio
templates.description: A scraper example that uses HTTP requests and Cheerio to parse HTML. It's fast, but it can't run the website's JavaScript or pass JS anti-scraping challenges.

templates.name: project_puppeteer_crawler_ts
templates.label: Crawlee & Puppeteer & Chrome
templates.description: Example of a Puppeteer and headless Chrome web scraper. Headless browsers render JavaScript and are harder to block, but they're slower than plain HTTP.

templates.name: project_playwright_crawler_ts
templates.label: Crawlee & Playwright & Chrome
templates.description: Web scraper example with Crawlee, Playwright and headless Chrome. Playwright is more modern, user-friendly and harder to block than Puppeteer.

templates.name: project_playwright_test_runner
templates.label: Playwright & Chrome Test Runner
templates.description: Example of using the Playwright Test project to run automated website tests in the cloud and display their results. Usable as an API.

templates.name: ts_empty
templates.label: Empty TypeScript Actor
templates.description: Empty starter Actor in TypeScript. A blank slate with minimal starting code. Useful for quick scripting without having to delete bunch of stuff from other templates.

templates.name: project_empty
templates.label: Empty JavaScript Actor
templates.description: Empty starter Actor. A blank slate with minimal starting code. Useful for quick scripting without having to delete bunch of stuff from other templates.

templates.name: project_cypress
templates.label: Cypress
templates.description: Example of running Cypress tests and saving their results on the Apify platform. JSON results are saved to Dataset, videos to Key-value store.

templates.name: project_empty
templates.label: Empty JavaScript Actor
templates.description: Empty starter Actor. A blank slate with minimal starting code. Useful for quick scripting without having to delete bunch of stuff from other templates.
